Vehicle.Name: Cargohopper 102 Cargo Lifter
Vehicle.Description:
[H3]Taggeco. Cargohopper 102 Cargo Lifter[h3]
A small airspeeder designed to transfer cargo to and from smaller spaceports and locations inaccessible to large freighters and transports, the Cargohopper 102 is a familiar sight throughout the galaxy. Capable of vertical takeoff and landing and relatively easy to handle with little or no training, these cargo lifters are a vital part of galactic trade, as well as a necessity for smugglers doing business in remote systems and sectors. The Cargohopper 102 comes equipped with a small, industrial-grade tractor beam to aid in the loading and unloading of cargo.
